personalInfo.name: Tayyub Yaqoob
personalInfo.title: Digital Analyst & AI/ML Solutions Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Digital Analyst with 5+ years experience delivering AI/ML modules, analytics automation, and cloud data products. I build forecasting engines, anomaly detection, sentiment analysis, MMM, and robust GA4–BigQuery pipelines. Freelance data consultant and Cointelegraph contributor.

experience.title: Digital Analyst
experience.description: Lead AI/ML and analytics modules across organic and paid teams. Own data pipelines, forecasting, MMM, anomaly detection, audits, and automation.
achievements: Built 6+ Codex modules (forecasting, query forecast, sitemap similarity, anomaly detection, sentiment analysis, synergy).
GA4 + BigQuery pipelines, Advanced Consent Mode V2, GTM regex tables, and automated reporting at scale.
Delivered data retainers and insights for brands incl. Neilson Holidays, Clogau, Tesco Bank, Royal London.

experience.title: Data & AI Consultant
experience.description: Consulting on GA4/GTM/BigQuery, AWS & Vertex AI workloads, dashboards, and automation.
achievements: Scaled workloads via AWS Lambda/Fargate/EC2; containerized jobs per client.
Automated Looker dashboards and MMM pipelines with BigQuery.

experience.title: AI/ML Content Creator (as Callum Reid)
experience.description: Research-backed articles on AI in crypto and DeFi.
achievements: Published 35+ articles on AI, ML and Blockchain
How-to guides and deep dives aligned to editorial & SEO standards.
